Package com.sim.proj

Class App

java.lang.Object
com.sim.proj.App
class App extends Object
Main class for Bank Queuing Simulation with New Realities project University of Ottawa CSI 4124 group 4 fall 2021. Group Members and Student IDs: ● Samuel Garneau (2380248) ● Chengen Lyu (300028734) ● Jahesh Davodra (300018359) ● Le Nguyen (300013304) ● Luke Germond (300014113)
